name: WeForest (asbl)
goal:
WeForest is a Belgian NGO and an internatioanl team which focuses on halting global warming through large bio-diverse tree planting projects in tropical countries. Planting trees can halt global warming by restoring the hydrological process of our planet.
WeForest is contributing in 3 ways:
1. Demonstrating it is possible with scalable best practices on the ground (with over 20 million trees to date).
2. Promoting the scientific exchange and dissemination on the dynamics of global hydrology and trees for climate. WeForest is advancing the forest/water-cycle/climate research by organising high level scientific conferences
3. Creating a movement with corporate brands (over 350 to date) who use trees as a currency to engage consumers, drawing on marketing and CSR budgets to Make Earth Cooler.
euInitiatives: Greenhouse gas emissions from agriculture and LULUCF in the context of the 2030 EU climate and energy framework
